website_summaries.verdict: If you want a bedding set with looks that stand out, it's a good choice, but others we considered are made of sturdier material.
pros: Hypoallergenic, polyester-fill comforter that's suitable for all seasons
Comes with 8 pieces, including a dust ruffle
cons: Comforter's fill tends to bunch up after washing, and the material is a bit thin and prone to snags

customer_reviews.title: Really great, excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Just an amazing set for the price, my daughter LOVES it. It looks fantastic and really does look very expensive. It's also really soft and cozy. Everytime I walk past it I am very glad that I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ilikebooks

customer_reviews.title: Great long term value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself this bedding set when I moved into my first apartment to replace college bedding. I ordered the queen size and it arrived with everything as promised! It looks exactly like the pictures, and the stitching has only come undone in maybe two tiny, tiny sections. I was My concerns ordering this were that 1) the stitching would look worse in person or come undone immediately, and that 2) it would bunch up after washing. Neither concern turned out to be valid! It's still in great shape and my boyfriend likes it, too. Easy to add colored details (extra pillow or a bright throw at the foot of the bed).
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Schoppper

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a comforter online with the pinch pleating pattern but I love this one. It's reversible and comfortable and looks awesome. If you want the look from the picture then make sure you have plenty of pillows to make the bed with. I haven't washed it yet so I don't know how the pinches will hold up when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a complete set and came across this one. After looking at other sets this was the one that look pretty and good price for all it comes with. The comforter is not too heavy, which I like so that it can fit in my washer. Just have in mind that the 2 euro shams are more for like a square pillow, I just bought two regular queen size gel pillows because they are really fluffy, super nice and they fill them up good. I like the it a lot. I recommend it 😁
customer_reviews.author: BP10

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit darker in person than in pic
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that it looked ok slightly darker in person than in the pic. I haven't cleaned it yet and just put it on my bed so I'm not yet sure how it'll hold up over time but it's very pretty and feels nice
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in the room and the pillows go great. It’s super comfortable and is perfect, not to heavy to where your sweating but not too light to where your cold. The only thing was that the photo is misleading. The comforter is not that long on the bed. My bed (queen) is maybe about two feet off the ground and it only about half way down. This doesn’t bother me because of how I make my bed, but for those who let it hang down should know
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. Very soft and fits my queen bed perfectly. This is a lightweight comforter. Really good value for the price. I had this washed by the cleaners and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft. Classic look.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, lightweight, and fits a queen. A little oversized which looks great! Great for summers or if you tend to get hot while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeee them!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and warm high quality you would think you was in a 5 star hotel!
customer_reviews.author: Money Rell

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! This is very soft and not super sturdy but its very pretty and very soft. Purchased for our guestroom and tried to get one for my own bed after I felt how soft it was but the color selection was gone for my King bed. Only washed once so far when it came in the mail and everything stayed together.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I loved it! Very soft and nice quality. I was concerned when I read a review that all of the pieces weren’t included, but it arrived as advertised. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Relieved all 8 pieces. Decent quality, but some of the stitching was coming loose when I opened it and the fabric is only semi soft. Also, I recommend washing them first because they have a weird smell. That might soften them up a bit too. But all in all, good set for the price. Looks nice when it's all on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I got the queen set for my double bed and it fits like the double/queen comforter that I had before from target. This is super comfy and soft! I've had it for a few months and I still love it. (Easy to make the bed, too! Always a plus!)
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This set was very poorly made of cheap material. The comforter and bed skirt meted when I put it in the dryer to get out the wrinkles! I had not even washed it yet! The washing instructions were to wash and dry normally. Plus, there was no clear description of the pieces included, so I ordered a bed skirt separately of another brand. Good thing, since I will be using that one after all. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B Horner

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set wanting something soft and comfy and it's exactly that. Feels like soft cotton I just want to snuggle under all day. Everything was a tad wrinkled so I tossed em in the dryer dokie a few minutes on medium heat and they came out perfectly fluffed and wrinkle free. The queen size fit my queen bed just right. Looks very feminine and shabby chic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bed perfectly. Washes easily and I love the design! Just what I needed and wanted
customer_reviews.author: naz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product stay away
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Garbage product. Within no time the most of the seems have split the comforter stuffing has rolled all to one end of the comforter and looks horrible now. Overall quality is a joke. Will never buy from this seller or this product line ever again and I advise against anyone else doing the same
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Poorly put together. Matting clumping inside fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the blanket a month and it's matting is clumpy around inside the fabric. Very poor quality, but should have known for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. I’m going to need something heavier for the winter, but it’s nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Di

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!!! I had mine for about 6 months before some of the pleats started to pull apart though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I had kind of low expectations for a bedspread that was this reasonably priced but I was VERY pleasantly surprised with the quality. It's really soft and a nice, not-too-heavy weight and it's so pretty! I added color with a throw and a decorative pillow of my own and it looks beautiful. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: looks nothing like the picture and was destroyed the first time I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Torres

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its not as shown in the picture but i made it pretty and i like it. The best set when arrived was so much wrinkled which dissapointed me but somehow sorted it out. Now it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: uma

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: When we first got our comforter set it was great! However, it’s made from a cheap material and it ended up falling apart within a year. Also, if you’re buying this comforter for warmth this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Already washed it and there's no problems with it falling apart. All pieces were in bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darker color set
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed to find that the gray is much darker in person than it is in the picture. I was also told I would receive 2 pillow shams in my package and received only 1. The comforter is good quality but still disappointed I did not even receive all items promised.
customer_reviews.author: spencer jefferies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and pretty. I will say I thought the underside with the pattern would be more vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was plenty thick enough, however I can understand how others disagree. I give it 5 stars because I absolutely love it. It's very comfortable and came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: kisha hoyt

customer_reviews.title: After the first wash the comforter clumped up and ended up having to throw it away because it was so bad.
customer_reviews.text: Barely lasted us 2 months. After the first wash the comforter clumped up and ended up having to throw it away because it was so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and just the right weight not to hot during summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I really like it and I don't see any tears
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read reviews until after I ordered product. But I really like it and I don't see any tears, it's good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, not a huge fan of the quality of the fabric. Wish the comforter was the real size of the picture. The comforter doesn't come all the way down to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: L Broome

customer_reviews.title: It’s so cute and a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute and a good deal...so you think. I washed it ONE time and there is now a HUGE rip and hole in the seam. It’s ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Returned this ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, thin material but not awful. Product had some type of stain on it so it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: brian crosby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy to wash. Doesn't come with all the pillows listed though. Has covers for two large square pillows but does not include them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Its super soft and was a great price for what you get! 8 pieces!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KImikat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the price it's for a spare bedroom I love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicky virgo

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and classy. It is machine washable, I’ve washed mine twice with no issues. It’s made well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disappointed in this bed set for what I paid... I’ve had it a week and almost all of the pleated parts have come undone. Stitching was clearly done very poorly because it’s been washed one time and they’ve pulled apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Super fluffy but I ordered the queen size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fluffy but I ordered the queen size for my queen bed and it was a little short so if you have a tall bed then def go for the king size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, super soft and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I expected. Good quality, super soft and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! If you wash it I recommend letting it air dry, but the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty at first until all of the cotton collected in ...
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty at first until all of the cotton collected in the corner of the comforter as though it was 5 years old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and love that it came with the bed skirt ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and love that it came with the bed skirt and decorative pillows! Super affordable. Not super thick but still keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set and the fabric is soft and rich. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that one of the shams has a flaw where the edge of the fabric was missed when it was stitched - see picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumping
customer_reviews.text: This down comforter is great to begin with, but for only having it for under 3 months all of the filling clumped to one spot making the rest of the comforter practically an extra sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, very happy with this bed set and a reasonable price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set but the cotton moves around on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set but the cotton moves around on the inside causing it to bunch up in certain areas so the comforter looks lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Angry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 8 pieces worth much more!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture. Very plush and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Phyliss

customer_reviews.title: This bed set is GREAT! Light
customer_reviews.text: This bed set is GREAT! Light, soft, comfy & looks great. My package came with all 8 pieces listed. I would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as fluffy as the picture and is really thin.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected and has washed up very well! Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is almost like a duvet cover in the inside parts keep shifting ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ok bedding. Is almost like a duvet cover in the inside parts keep shifting down to the bottom and keep needing to adjust it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: This bedding set is perfect! It looks wonderful on our bed and was ...
customer_reviews.text: This bedding set is perfect! It looks wonderful on our bed and was just the right price for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Rus

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!!
customer_reviews.text: It's warm and looks nice but when I make the bed the stuffing on the inside bunches up to one side and then your covering up with no stuffing in it. And plus its a pain in the butt when u have to get all the stuffing to even out before u can make your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha reimer

customer_reviews.title: I finally received this after over a month of being ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally received this after over a month of being delayed and it had feces stains on it! Plus all the places it was pinched were snagged. Supposed to be a Christmas gift and has turned into complete nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: tumbler1234

customer_reviews.title: The product is not how is in the picture I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is not how is in the picture I give you 0 start
customer_reviews.author: R&R Custom Remodeling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I think this product looked nice but the issue is the blanket. It feels cheap on the outside. I have used it for about two weeks and the inside has come apart from the outside leaving horrible lumps and empty parts. I wanted to buy it as a nice guest blanket for my house. When my husband got the flu I used it for myself when I slept in another bed. I am glad I never had ay guest use this blanket and will be throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but within two months the stitching began to come out on the comforter and euro shams. Ruined the look of the entire ensemble! So disappointed!!! Bought everything in the room to match this comforter set!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Pillow cases are so cheap they pretty much disintegrated in the dryer. And why would you want a comforter with a bed skirt but no sheets?! Who even uses bed skirts anymore??? Pretty much the only thing that was decent quality where the two small pillows that it comes with. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the design of this bedding when I purchased it. However, I’ve had the comforter for 6 months. It’s completely worn down. Looks much older than it is. I’ve had cheaper yet better quality comforters last years compared to this!! Very disappointed with this purchase and the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Em E.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful comforter, however some of the stitching is coming undone already and it's leaving holes in the fabric. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something lightweight and stylish. This fit the bill. Very attractive. HOWEVER, after several washings, the padding clumped. The tufts are not sewn through to the other side to hold filling in place; there is stitching, but only every few feet. After 3 years it no longer looks good.
customer_reviews.author: lela26

customer_reviews.title: Mesh part of bed skirt and lining in shams melted in dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Mesh part on bed skirt and pinch pleat pillow shams (used to line the shams) melted after only one wash. I was very disappointed with this comforter ensemble. I washed the bed skirt with another one I already owned (with a similar mesh that goes over the box spring) and the new one came out of the dryer mangled while my old one looked great. I cut the lining out of the pinch pleated shams which made them very flimsy to use. The comforter and decorative pillows in the set were OK but I was very unhappy with the bed skirt (no longer usable) and the lined shams. This purchase was not a good one for me.
customer_reviews.author: AnneBC

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and feel of this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this comforter. For the price it's quite well made. However, I wanted a decent looking comforter that could be washed at home, and this is not it. The stuffing is not attached to the corners or edges, so after washing and drying it's all bunched up in the middle of the comforter. I believe had other less than a year, and am now looking to buy a different one. With kids and dogs, I need bedding that can be washed frequently. Although the material remains intact and looking good after washing, it's become impossible to fix the stuffing, and it's all bunched up in the middle. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia H.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, wrinkles easily, pillow cases look blah
customer_reviews.text: It's a little thin and wrinkles easily, but I like the pattern and color. The pillow cases are a little odd though, so the shams are the plain grey color on both sides, but the pillow cases are plain on one side, and have the pattern on the other. Problem is, the pattern is on the side the pillow case goes in, so it's slit down the middle. So stupid. I'm keeping it because I don't have the energy to keep looking for bedspreads, and I perked it up with some throw pillows I purchased elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: nona39

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disgusted and because of this i will never buy sheet ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I received my order and as i was unzipping the package... from the outside of the plastic i saw bed bugs all over it. I immediately ran and throw the whole thing outside. I'm so disgusted and because of this i will never buy sheet products online.... I had to wash and clean everything in my room because i was so paranoid one got into my room... this is so disappointing. The malefaction warehouse should be ashamed they are harming their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie G

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Washed twice and had no issues. One pillow case has a place where the bunching design has come unstitched, but only one place has that issue.
customer_reviews.author: JL2410

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Listen to reviewer warnings!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but one wash and its ruined. I read other reviews warning about this and thought, "They probably just don't know how to wash a comforter." I've had other comforters bunch-up the filling from washing, but they at least have still been useful as comforters.--Not this one. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks and all the extra pillows that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks and all the extra pillows that come with it. It is a little cheaply made but for the price of the whole set im happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ST2008

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It's super soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's super soft and warm. The look is great. It comes with two cute decor pillows and four shams. Two square and two regular ones. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: fantastic bed set
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bedding set. Perfect price, amazing quality, great and fast shipping. I'm not a fan of being either too hot, or too cold while sleeping, but this comforter is PERFECTLY in-between. It's beautiful and well made. Came with everything described. ( Comforter,2 pillow shams, and two decorative pillows). Will recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is super soft and I love the contrast of turning down ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft and I love the contrast of turning down the top of the comforter to get the white and gray color scheme. Both sides are soft and fluffy.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Purchase
customer_reviews.text: A little more lightweight than a previous comforter we had, but I actually like that. Color is true to description and reversible feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Z.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy while being durable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and classy while being durable. I have two large dogs and they often jump on the bed, but you'd never know it. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: allie's review

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedding, good fit
customer_reviews.text: My teen wanted this set and absolutely loves it. It fit the queen bed fine. The bedding was softer than we expected which is a plus.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received a 7 piece set. Not 8 piece, which is what was advertised. The small decorative pillows are all deformed. Returning!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bedding set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bedding set! I bought it for a guest room but liked it so much that I ended up putting it in the master. The quality seems great and the price was excellent. Such a great value for everything included in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea LaPlant

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this product I washed the comforter as instructed and the inside material was rolled into a big cotton ball and now it lost its fluffyness.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Usually I though my new comforter in ...

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful. It is perfect for warm or cool weather
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. It is perfect for warm or cool weather. The only problem with it is that not even washing it yet the inside is bunching up in places.

customer_reviews.text: It’s OK but I thought it was going to be a better quality.

customer_reviews.text: Worked out fine. Did what we needed it to do

customer_reviews.text: This set looks really nice but it's not functional. The comforter has some type of foam in it instead of a blanket. The foam became disconnected from the outside material and now it's extremely misshapen.

customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! so soft and cozy for the price... Loved the color!

customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it because it was comfy, but that only lasted for less than two weeks. The comforter came apart and is so uncomfortable to use now. I have requested a refund. Love love love! It's nice and comfy! The material is great! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: MommyBrynn

product_meta.title: Unique Home 8 Piece Reversible Pinch Pleat Comforter Set Fade Resistant, Wrinkle Free, No Ironing Necessary, Super Soft, Queen, Grey
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:GreyElegant, pinch pleated design reversible spices up any bedroom. 100% hypoallergenic polyester filling for extra softness.
feature_bullets: 100% hypoallergenic polyester filling for extra softness
Appropriate filling to give you warmth, comfort and loft of a blanket
Elegant, pinch pleated design reversibble spices up any bedroom
Care Instruction: Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water (sun dry or low tumble dry)
